Circle Pager Learn More

Api Details

Settings

  • slidesToShow String  -  The number of slides to show in one view / pane
  • startingSlide String  -  First showing slide/group, an 0-based integer
  • loop String  -  Setting loop: true will loop back after next/previous reached to end

Functions

show

Show a slide to First Slide

Parameters

  • index String  -  The index of the slide to show (0 based)

first

Move to First Slide

last

Move to Last Slide

prev

Move to Previous Slide

next

Move to Next Slide

Configuration Options

  1. Default Circle Pager Example View Example
  2. Circle Pager on a Form View Example
  3. Circle Pager with more than one item per slide View Example
  4. Circle Pager on a Tab Example View Example

Code Example

This example shows how markup the circle pager. Then call $(elem).circlepager() to invoke. The structure of the circle pager is that you have a circlepager div followed by a slides container and then one slider per "page". The page content goes in the slide-content element.


<div class="circlepager example1">
  <div class="slides">

    <div class="slide">
      <div class="slide-content">
        <p>
          <a href="#" class="hyperlink">Nikon 24-85mm f/2.8-4.0D IF Auto Focus Zoom</a><br />
        $750.00
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="slide">
      <div class="slide-content">
        <p>
          <a href="#" class="hyperlink">Nikon 24-85mm f/2.8-4.0D IF Auto Focus Zoom</a><br />
        $750.00
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="slide">
      <div class="slide-content">
        <p>
          <a href="#" class="hyperlink">Nikon 24-85mm f/2.8-4.0D IF Auto Focus Zoom</a><br />
        $750.00
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>
</div>

Accessibility

  • Carousel guidelines apply.
  • We do not auto move the carousel elements
  • User can tab to the cicles and activate

Keyboard Shortcuts

  • Tab: Tab through the pager buttons (circles)
  • Enter: Activate a Page

Upgrading from 3.X

  • Replaces .inforCarousel() in a more limited fashion
